name: Our Home (itch)
description:
Our Home is a 3D, co-op, puzzle game with a fixed position camera. Set in a gloomy, glowing low poly forest, a wild cat a dog who are friends, solve puzzles to find their way back to their den by removing obstacles from their path and climbing, jumping and tunnelling to reach the end before morning.

Design: Geordie Hawkins, James Paspaliaris
Art: Tara Pers, Josh Linker, Robert Deals
Programming: Paul Nourish, Ethun Moffat
Audio: Yili Xiao
